term.title: lyotropic mesophase

item.text: A mesophase formed by dissolving an amphiphilicmesogen in a suitable solvent, under appropriate conditions of concentration, temperature, and pressure.

sources.item: PAC, 2002, 74, 493. 'Definitions of basic terms relating to polymer liquid crystals (IUPAC Recommendations 2001)' on page 496 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200274030493)
